title: informal consultations
text:
United Nations 
A/C.5/80/L.20
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
28 December 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-21132 (E)    311225 
*2521132* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Fifth Committee 
Agenda item 148 
Administrative and budgetary aspects of the financing 
of the United Nations peacekeeping operations 
 
 
 
Draft resolution submitted by the Chair of the Committee following 
informal consultations 
 
 
Support account for peacekeeping operations 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Having considered the report of the Secretary-General on the revised estimates 
relating to the proposed programme budget for 2026 and the support account for 
peacekeeping operations for the 2025/26 period,1 the report of the Independent Audit 
Advisory Committee on internal oversight 2 and the related report of the Advisory 
Committee on Administrative and Budgetary Questions,3 
 
1. 
Takes note of the report of the Secretary-General and the report of the 
Independent Audit Advisory Committee; 
 
2. 
Endorses the conclusions and recommendations contained in the report of 
the Advisory Committee on Administrative and Budgetary Questions. 
 
__________________ 
 
1 Relevant parts of A/80/400. 
 
2 A/80/90/Add.1. 
 
3 A/80/538.

paragraphs.1: Takes note of the report of the Secretary-General and the report of the Independent Audit Advisory Committee;
paragraphs.2: Endorses the conclusions and recommendations contained in the report of the Advisory Committee on Administrative and Budgetary Questions. __________________ 1 Relevant parts of A/80/400. 2 A/80/90/Add.1. 3 A/80/538.
